meanings.definition: The quality or state of being choppy.
meanings.sent1: The choppinesses of the waves made it hard to swim smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The boat struggled to navigate through the choppinesses of the sea.
meanings.sent3: The choppinesses of the water made the ducks bob up and down comically.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had a choppinesses to it, like a rough sea of words crashing against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The choppinesses of the road made the car bounce and jolt unpredictably.

meanings.definition: The irregular or rough quality of a surface or body of water.
meanings.sent1: The choppinesses of the terrain made hiking difficult.
meanings.sent2: The choppinesses of the lake made it challenging to row smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The choppinesses of the ground caused the ball to bounce in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent4: The choppinesses of the river resembled a wild dance of water and rocks.
meanings.sent5: The choppinesses of the landscape created a rugged and uneven path for the travelers.
